jsx.ui.vect.canvas
Class CanvasDraft

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.Configurable
          jsx.Source
              jsx.ui.Widget
                  jsx.ui.vect.canvas.CanvasDraw
                      jsx.ui.vect.canvas.CanvasDraft
All Implemented Interfaces:
OnDragMove, OnDragStart, OnDragStop
Direct Known Subclasses:
CanvasLine
public abstract class CanvasDraft
extends CanvasDraw

An abstract base class for drawing tools that can interactively draw on a wrapped canvas with the help of a cached draft canvas.

A drawing tool of a subclass of this one wraps a Canvas component and draws a specific type of shapes in accordance with the Mouse handle to which it listens mouse events but shows the intermediate drawings on a draft canvas.

A CanvasDraft widget is Configurable and is also an event source which may fire high level events.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

Field Detail

PRESS

protected static final Id<DragStart> PRESS

A global identifier for a configurable property of a CanvasDraft object.

The identified configurable property of a CanvasDraft widget caches the latest mouse press event that occurs on the canvas.

Since:
1.0

DRAFT

protected static final Id<Canvas> DRAFT

A global identifier for a configurable property of a CanvasDraft object.

The identified configurable property of a CanvasDraft widget caches the draft canvas widget cached by the canvas drawing tool.

Since:
1.0
Constructor Detail

CanvasDraft

protected CanvasDraft(Canvas c)

A typical constructor that constructs a wrapper widget of this type and forces constructors of subclasses to pass a Canvas widget.

This constructor invokes the typical constructor of the superclass passing the component wrapped by the specified Canvas widget that is set to the configurable property CanvasDraw.CANVAS of the widget to be constructed.

Parameters:
c - A canvas widget.
Since:
1.0
Method Detail

getDraft

protected static final Canvas getDraft(CanvasDraw d)

Gets the draft canvas cached by this canvas drawing wrapper.

This method simply returns the configurable property DRAFT of this wrapper widget if it exists. If it does not, this method will create a new one, set it to the property and return it.

Returns:
The draft canvas cached by this canvas drawing tool.
Since:
1.0

onEvent

public void onEvent(DragStart evt)

Performs an action on the dispatched event.

This method invokes the overridden method of the superclass to initialize and caches the mouse press event in the configurable property PRESS of the current canvas drawing tool.

Specified by:
onEvent in interface OnDragStart
Overrides:
onEvent in class CanvasDraw
Parameters:
evt - The event dispatched to this listener.
Since:
1.0

onEvent

public void onEvent(DragMove evt)

Performs an action on the dispatched event.

This method clears the cached draft canvas if the current canvas drawing tool is in a drawing mode.

Parameters:
evt - The event dispatched to this listener.
Since:
1.0

onEvent

public void onEvent(DragStop evt)

Performs an action on the dispatched event.

If the current canvas drawing tool is in a drawing mode this method deletes the cached draft canvas.

Parameters:
evt - The event dispatched to this listener.
Since:
1.0
